verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> But Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> What עָזַ֥רְתָּ <S%H5826><s%> How hast thou helped לְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> [that hath] no כֹ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> ability ה֝וֹשַׁ֗עְתָּ <S%H3467><s%> have saved זְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> thou the arm לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> strength

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יָּ֭עַצְתָּ <S%H3289><s%> How hast thou counselled לְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> [him that hath] no חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְ֝תוּשִׁיָּ֗ה <S%H8454><s%> helpful לָרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> have abundantly הוֹדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> declared

אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for מִ֭י <S%H4310><s%> to whom הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> To whom hast thou uttered מִלִּ֑ין <S%H4405><s%> answer וְנִשְׁמַת־ <S%H5397><s%> spirit מִ֝י <S%H4310><s%> to whom יָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> came מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> through

הָרְפָאִ֥ים <S%H7496><s%> Dead יְחוֹלָ֑לוּ <S%H2342><s%> [things] are formed מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under מַ֝֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> from under the waters וְשֹׁכְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7931><s%> and the inhabitants

עָר֣וֹם <S%H6174><s%> [is] naked שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> Hell נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5048><s%> before וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has כְּ֝ס֗וּת <S%H3682><s%> hath no covering לָֽאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H11><s%> before him and destruction

נֹטֶ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> He stretcheth out צָפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the north עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over תֹּ֑הוּ <S%H8414><s%> over the empty place תֹּ֥לֶה <S%H8518><s%> [and] hangeth אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּלִי־ <S%H1099><s%> upon nothing מָֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> He

צֹרֵֽר־ <S%H6887><s%> He bindeth up מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters בְּעָבָ֑יו <S%H5645><s%> in his thick clouds וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not נִבְקַ֖ע <S%H1234><s%> is not rent עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> and the cloud תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

מְאַחֵ֥ז <S%H270><s%> He holdeth back פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the face כִסֵּ֑ה <S%H3678><s%> of his throne פַּרְשֵׁ֖ז <S%H6576><s%> [and] spreadeth עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> over עֲנָנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6051><s%> his cloud

חֹֽק־ <S%H2706><s%> with bounds חָ֭ג <S%H2328><s%> He hath compassed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the surface מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the waters עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> At תַּכְלִ֖ית <S%H8503><s%> come to an end א֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> until the day עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> and night
עַמּוּדֵ֣י <S%H5982><s%> The pillars שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven יְרוֹפָ֑פוּ <S%H7322><s%> tremble וְ֝יִתְמְה֗וּ <S%H8539><s%> and are astonished מִגַּעֲרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1606><s%> at his reproof

בְּ֭כֹחוֹ <S%H3581><s%> with his power רָגַ֣ע <S%H7280><s%> He divideth הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea [וּבִתוּבְנָתֹו כ] (וּ֝בִתְבוּנָתֹ֗ו <S%H8394><s%> fruit ק) מָ֣חַץ <S%H4272><s%> he smiteth רָֽהַב׃ <S%H7293><s%> through the proud

בְּ֭רוּחוֹ <S%H7307><s%> By his spirit שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens שִׁפְרָ֑ה <S%H8235><s%> he hath garnished חֹֽלֲלָ֥ה <S%H2490><s%> has pierced יָ֝ד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand נָחָ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> serpent בָּרִֽיחַ׃ <S%H1281><s%> the crooked

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֵ֤לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> these קְצ֬וֹת <S%H7098><s%> Lo these [are] parts [דַּרְכֹּו כ] (דְּרָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> along ק) וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and how שֵּׁ֣מֶץ <S%H8102><s%> but how little דָּ֭בָר <S%H1697><s%> a portion נִשְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> is heard בּ֑וֹ וְרַ֥עַם <S%H7482><s%> of him? but the thunder [גְּבוּרָתֹו כ] (גְּ֝בוּרֹותָ֗יו <S%H1369><s%> force ק) מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H995><s%> who can understand ס
